articles.title: Japanese figures visit Korea Hall
articles.content:
Japanese figures visit Korea Hall
    Tokyo, March 22 (KNS-KCNA) -- Osamu Yatabe, chairman of the central executive committee of the New Socialist Party, representative of the party and member of the House of Councilors of Japan, and Soko Shimabukuro, chairman and representative of the Okinawa Social Mass Party and member of the House of Councilors of Japan, visited the Korea Hall in Tokyo on March 18.   They met and conversed with So Man Sul, first vice-chairman of the central standing committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and Nam Sung U, director of the international affairs department of Chongryon.   They said they were pleased with the fact that an agreement was recently reached between the DPRK and the United States and hailed it.   They criticized the wrong attitude taken by Japan toward the issue of improving relations with the DPRK and said they would strive to make the Korea policy of the government rectified.

articles.content:
New method of treatment of prostatic hypertrophy
   Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Korean medical scientists have registered success in the treatment of prostatic hypertrophy, a typical disease of the aged.   The Pyongyang People's Hospital No.3 recently developed a new method of treatment of the disease, much more effective than TUR-P (transurethral resection of the prostate), the world trend of treatment, and introduced it into clinical treatment.   
   This method needs very simple equipment and shorter time of treatment (about 7 days) and operation (24 minutes) than previous methods.   Several complications can be prevented as this method involves a small quantity of perfusive liquid (1-2 liters) due to rare bleeding during operation. So, this method of treatment can be applied to the old patients or the men who have heart or blood vessel troubles.
